languages.text: {n}Вы слышите насмешливое фырканье со стороны Идиры.{/n} "Ага-ага, знавала я таких "мечтателей"! Всегда они как лучше хотят, а выходит ересь всякая. Был у нас один авторитет на планете — души в гигиене зубной не чаял. Чтобы люди его от боли не страдали, он им начал гнилые зубы, того этого, выкорчевывать. Только малясь увлекся и после больных начал драть и здоровые тоже, иногда вместе с челюстью — для "профилактики", так сказать. Ну, ему толпа беззубых служек в итоге башку и открутила, тоже для профилактики — головушка-то явно насквозь гнилая была".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы слышите насмешливое фырканье со стороны Идиры.{/n} "Ага-ага, знавала я таких "мечтателей"! Всегда они как лучше хотят, а выходит ересь всякая. Был у нас один авторитет на планете – души в гигиене зубной не чаял. Чтобы люди его от боли не страдали, он им начал гнилые зубы, того этого, выкорчевывать. Только малясь увлекся и после больных начал драть и здоровые тоже, иногда вместе с челюстью — для "профилактики", так сказать. Ну, ему толпа беззубых служек в итоге башку и открутила, тоже для профилактики – головушка-то явно насквозь гнилая была".

languages.text: {n}You hear Idira scoffing.{/n} "Yeah, I've known a few 'dreamers' like that myself! They always want what's best, but somehow it always ends in heresy. Back on my world, there was a big shot who was really into dental hygiene. To spare his people from pain, he started pulling out all their rotten teeth. But he, uh, got slightly carried away and started pulling healthy ones too, sometimes along with the jaw. 'Preventive care,' he called it. So a mob of toothless servants ended up tearing his kindly head clean off. It was preventive too, you see — that little noggin of his was rotten through and through."

traits.locale_text: {n}You hear Idira scoffing.{/n} "Yeah, I've known a few 'dreamers' like that myself! They always want what's best, but somehow it always ends in heresy. There was this big shot on our planet who was deeply fond of dental hygiene. To spare his people from pain, he went about pulling out their rotten teeth. But he, uh, got a little carried away, so he started pulling healthy ones too, sometimes along with the jaw. 'Preventive care,' he called it. So a mob of toothless servants ended up tearing his kindly head off. It was preventive too, you see — his head was rotten through and through."

languages.text: {n}Oyes a Idira burlándose.{/n} «¡Sí, sí, yo misma he conocido a unos cuantos "soñadores"! Siempre quieren lo mejor, pero, por alguna razón, siempre terminan cometiendo herejías. En mi mundo, había un tipo importante que estaba obsesionado con la higiene dental. Para evitar el dolor de su gente, empezó a sacarles todos los dientes podridos. Pero, bueno... se emocionó un poco y empezó a arrancar los sanos, a veces junto con la mandíbula. Lo llamaba "cuidado preventivo". En consecuencia, una horda de siervos desdentados acabó arrancándole la cabeza de un tirón. Esto también fue preventivo, ¿sabe? Ese cerebrito suyo estaba podrido de cabo a rabo».
languages.original_text: {n}You hear Idira scoffing.{/n} "Yeah, I've known a few 'dreamers' like that myself! They always want what's best, but somehow it always ends in heresy. Back on my world, there was a big shot who was really into dental hygiene. To spare his people from pain, he started pulling out all their rotten teeth. But he, uh, got slightly carried away and started pulling healthy ones too, sometimes along with the jaw. 'Preventive care,' he called it. So a mob of toothless servants ended up tearing his kindly head clean off. It was preventive too, you see — that little noggin of his was rotten through and through."

traits.locale_text: {n}Oyes a Idira burlándose.{/n} «¡Sí, sí, yo misma he conocido a unos cuantos "soñadores"! Siempre quieren lo mejor, pero, por alguna razón, siempre terminan cometiendo herejías. En mi mundo, había un tipo importante que estaba obsesionado con la higiene dental. Para evitar el dolor de su gente, empezó a sacarles todos los dientes podridos. Pero, bueno... se emocionó un poco y empezó a arrancar los sanos, a veces junto con la mandíbula. Lo llamaba "cuidado preventivo". En consecuencia, una horda de siervos desdentados acabó arrancándole la cabeza de un tirón. Esto también fue preventivo, ¿sabe? Ese cerebrito suyo estaba podrido de cabo a rabo».

languages.text: {n}Du hörst Idira aufprusten.{/n} "Ja, ich kannte auch ein paar solche 'Träumer'. Sie wollen immer nur das Beste, doch irgendwie endet es immer in Ketzerei. Auf meiner Welt gab es einen sehr wichtigen Mann, der sehr auf Zahnhygiene bedacht war. Um seinen Untertanen Schmerz zu ersparen, begann er, ihnen die verfaulten Zähne herauszuziehen. Nur hat er es etwas, äh, übertrieben begann, auch gesunde herauszureißen, manchmal auch gleich den gesamten Kiefer. 'Vorsorge', nannte er das. Also riss ihm eines Tages ein Mob zahnloser Diener seinen fürsorglichen Kopf ab. Auch das war Vorsorge, wisst Ihr — sein kleiner Schädel war durch und durch verfault gewesen."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear Idira scoffing.{/n} "Yeah, I've known a few 'dreamers' like that myself! They always want what's best, but somehow it always ends in heresy. Back on my world, there was a big shot who was really into dental hygiene. To spare his people from pain, he started pulling out all their rotten teeth. But he, uh, got slightly carried away and started pulling healthy ones too, sometimes along with the jaw. 'Preventive care,' he called it. So a mob of toothless servants ended up tearing his kindly head clean off. It was preventive too, you see — that little noggin of his was rotten through and through."

Auf meiner Welt gab es einen sehr wichtigen Mann, der sehr auf Zahnhygiene bedacht war. Um seinen Untertanen Schmerz zu ersparen, begann er, ihnen die verfaulten Zähne herauszuziehen. Nur hat er es etwas, äh, übertrieben begann, auch gesunde herauszureißen, manchmal auch gleich den gesamten Kiefer. 'Vorsorge', nannte er das. Also riss ihm eines Tages ein Mob zahnloser Diener seinen fürsorglichen Kopf ab. Auch das war Vorsorge, wisst Ihr — sein kleiner Schädel war durch und durch verfault gewesen."

languages.text: {n}Vous entendez Idira s'esclaffer.{/n} « Ouais, moi aussi, j'en ai connu des "rêveurs" dans son genre ! Ils ont toujours de bonnes intentions, mais d'une façon ou d'une autre, ça vire toujours à l'hérésie. Sur mon monde, on avait un grand ponte passionné par l'hygiène dentaire. Parce qu'il avait pas envie de voir souffrir ses gars, il s'est mis à leur arracher toutes leurs dents cariées... sauf qu'il s'est un peu emballé et qu'il s'est mis à arracher aussi les dents saines, et même parfois carrément toute la mâchoire. Selon lui, c'était des "soins préventifs". Et c'est comme ça qu'une foule de serviteurs édentés a fini par lui couper la tête. Mais ça aussi, c'était préventif : sa petite caboche à lui était complètement pourrie de l'intérieur. »
languages.original_text: {n}You hear Idira scoffing.{/n} "Yeah, I've known a few 'dreamers' like that myself! They always want what's best, but somehow it always ends in heresy. Back on my world, there was a big shot who was really into dental hygiene. To spare his people from pain, he started pulling out all their rotten teeth. But he, uh, got slightly carried away and started pulling healthy ones too, sometimes along with the jaw. 'Preventive care,' he called it. So a mob of toothless servants ended up tearing his kindly head clean off. It was preventive too, you see — that little noggin of his was rotten through and through."

Selon lui, c'était des "soins préventifs". Et c'est comme ça qu'une foule de serviteurs édentés a fini par lui couper la tête. Mais ça aussi, c'était préventif : sa petite caboche à lui était complètement pourrie de l'intérieur. »

languages.text: {n}你听见伊迪拉嗤笑起来。{/n}“是啊，我也认识好几个这样的‘梦想家’！他们总说要追求至善至美，但不知何故，总是会走上异端邪道。说起来，我们那颗行星上就有位大人物，非常注重口腔卫生。为了让他的人民免于受苦，他四处巡游，为他们拔掉坏牙。不过，他后来干得有点过火了，不仅把好的牙也一起拔掉，有时候甚至连下巴一起拔掉，他说这叫做‘预防性治疗’。到了最后，一伙被拔光了牙的仆人，把他那慈祥的脑袋也给‘拔’了下来。你看，这也算是某种预防措施了，现在他的小脑瓜早就烂得透透的啦。”
languages.original_text: {n}You hear Idira scoffing.{/n} "Yeah, I've known a few 'dreamers' like that myself! They always want what's best, but somehow it always ends in heresy. Back on my world, there was a big shot who was really into dental hygiene. To spare his people from pain, he started pulling out all their rotten teeth. But he, uh, got slightly carried away and started pulling healthy ones too, sometimes along with the jaw. 'Preventive care,' he called it. So a mob of toothless servants ended up tearing his kindly head clean off. It was preventive too, you see — that little noggin of his was rotten through and through."

traits.locale_text: {n}你听见伊迪拉嗤笑起来。{/n}“是啊，我也认识好几个这样的‘梦想家’！他们总说要追求至善至美，但不知何故，总是会走上异端邪道。我们那颗行星上就有位大人物，非常注重口腔卫生。为了让他的人民免于受苦，他四处巡游，为他们拔掉坏牙。不过，他后来干得有点过火了，不仅把好的牙也一起拔掉，有时候甚至连下巴一起拔掉，他说这叫做‘预防性治疗’。到了最后，一伙被拔光了牙的仆人，把他那慈祥的脑袋也给‘拔’了下来。你看，这也算是某种预防措施了，现在他的小脑瓜早就烂得透透的啦。”

languages.text: {n}イディラが小馬鹿にしたように笑う。{/n}「そうね、あたいもそういう『夢想家』は何人か知ってるわ。彼らは常に理想を追い求めてるのに、なぜか最後は異端に終わる。あたいの惑星には、歯科衛生にとても熱心な有力者がいたの。皆を苦しみから救うと言って、彼は人々の腐った歯を残らず抜き始めた。でもその人は、何というか…熱中しすぎてしまったのね。健康な歯までも、ときには顎ごといっぺんに抜くようになった。彼曰く『予防治療』だったんですって。そしたら歯を抜かれた使用人たちが集団で、心優しい彼の頭をきれいにもぎ取ってしまったのよ。予防治療としてね。だって、ほら…彼の小さな脳みそは根っから腐っていたわけだから」
languages.original_text: {n}You hear Idira scoffing.{/n} "Yeah, I've known a few 'dreamers' like that myself! They always want what's best, but somehow it always ends in heresy. Back on my world, there was a big shot who was really into dental hygiene. To spare his people from pain, he started pulling out all their rotten teeth. But he, uh, got slightly carried away and started pulling healthy ones too, sometimes along with the jaw. 'Preventive care,' he called it. So a mob of toothless servants ended up tearing his kindly head clean off. It was preventive too, you see — that little noggin of his was rotten through and through."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラが小馬鹿にしたように笑う。{/n}「そうね、私のような『夢を描く人』は何人か知っているわ。いつでも一番を求めて、何故だか結局は異端ということになる。私の惑星にいたある人物は、歯科衛生に深くのめり込んでいたの。皆を苦しみから救うって、いつも腐った歯を残らず抜いていたわ。だけどねその人は、えっと、興が乗ってしまったのね。健康な歯までも、ときには顎ごといっぺんに引き抜くようになった。彼曰く『予防治療』らしいけど。それから歯を抜かれた患者が集団で、親切な彼の頭をきれいサッパリ引きちぎったのよ。これも予防治療だわ。だって、ほら…彼の小さな脳みそは根っから腐っていたわけだし」

{n}イディラが小馬鹿にしたように笑う。{/n}「そうね、あたいもそういう『夢想家』は何人か知ってるわ。彼らは常に理想を追い求めてるのに、なぜか最後は異端に終わる。あたいの惑星には、歯科衛生にとても熱心な有力者がいたの。皆を苦しみから救うと言って、彼は人々の腐った歯を残らず抜き始めた。でもその人は、何というか…熱中しすぎてしまったのね。健康な歯までも、ときには顎ごといっぺんに抜くようになった。彼曰く『予防治療』だったんですって。そしたら歯を抜かれた使用人たちが集団で、心優しい彼の頭をきれいにもぎ取ってしまったのよ。予防治療としてね。だって、ほら…彼の小さな脳みそは根っから腐っていたわけだから」

languages.text: {n}İdira'nın alaycı sesini duyuyorsun.{/n} "Evet, ben de zamanında böyle birkaç 'hayalperest' tanıdım! Hep en iyisini isterler ama hep de sonu bir şekilde kâfirliğe çıkar. Bizim dünyada diş hijyenine çok düşkün bir kodaman vardı. Halkı acıdan kurtarmak için tüm çürük dişleri çekmeye başladı. Sonra kendini... Biraz kaptırıp sağlıklı olanları da çekmeye vardı, kiminin çenesini de aldı. Buna 'önleyici bakım' diyordu. Hâl böyle olunca bir grup dişsiz hizmetçi de onun müşfik kafasını koparıp attı. Alın size bir önleyici bakım daha. Küçük kellesi, baştan aşağı çürümüştü."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear Idira scoffing.{/n} "Yeah, I've known a few 'dreamers' like that myself! They always want what's best, but somehow it always ends in heresy. Back on my world, there was a big shot who was really into dental hygiene. To spare his people from pain, he started pulling out all their rotten teeth. But he, uh, got slightly carried away and started pulling healthy ones too, sometimes along with the jaw. 'Preventive care,' he called it. So a mob of toothless servants ended up tearing his kindly head clean off. It was preventive too, you see — that little noggin of his was rotten through and through."
